p: Statistical comparisons of the mean antioxidant activity values of EOs were performed by one-way ANOVA, followed by the multiple Duncan test ( p â‰¤ 0.05 confidence level) using SPSS 20.0 (SPSS Inc., Chicago, USA). Pearson correlation and PLS-R (employing leave-one-out cross-validation) were carried out with the aid of Minitab 17 (Minitab Inc., State College, PA, USA).
